item.text: Then the fifth angel blew his trumpet, and I saw a star that had fallen from the sky to the earth, and he was given the key to the shaft of the abyss.

He<n id="1" /> <st data-num="455" class="">opened</st> the <st data-num="5421" class="">shaft</st> of the <st data-num="12" class="">abyss</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2586" class="">smoke</st> <st data-num="305">rose out</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">of</st> <st data-num="5421" class="">it</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="5613" class="">like</st> <st data-num="2586" class="">smoke</st> from a <st data-num="3173" class="">giant</st> <st data-num="2575" class="">furnace</st>. The<n id="3" /> <st data-num="2246" class="">sun</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="109" class="">air</st> were <st data-num="4656" class="">darkened</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">with</st> <st data-num="2586" class="">smoke</st> from the <st data-num="5421" class="">shaft</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1537">out of</st> the <st data-num="2586" class="">smoke</st> <st data-num="1831" class="">came</st> <st data-num="200" class="">locusts</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">onto</st> the <st data-num="1093" class="">earth</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="846" class="">they</st> were <st data-num="1325" class="">given</st> <st data-num="1849" class="">power</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="5613" class="">like</st> that of the <st data-num="4651" class="">scorpions</st> of the <st data-num="1093" class="">earth</st>.

<st data-num="846" class="">They</st><n id="1" /> were <st data-num="4483" class="">told</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> to <st data-num="91" class="">damage</st> the <st data-num="5528" class="">grass</st> of the <st data-num="1093" class="">earth</st>, <st data-num="3761" class="">or</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">any</st> <st data-num="5515" class="">green plant</st> <st data-num="3761" class="">or</st> <st data-num="1186" class="">tree</st>, <st data-num="1487 3361">but only</st> those <st data-num="444" class="">people</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="3748" class="">who</st> did <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> the <st data-num="4973" class="">seal</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> their<n id="4" /> <st data-num="3359" class="">forehead</st>.

The <st data-num="846" class="">locusts</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1325" class="">were</st> <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1325" class="">given permission</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2443" class="">to</st> <st data-num="615" class="">kill</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> only <st data-num="2443" class="">to</st> <st data-num="928">torture</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st><n id="5" /> for <st data-num="4002" class="">five</st> <st data-num="3376" class="">months</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="929" class="">torture</st> was <st data-num="5613" class="">like</st> <st data-num="929" class="">that</st><n id="6" /> of a <st data-num="4651" class="">scorpion</st> <st data-num="3752" class="">when</st> it <st data-num="3817" class="">stings</st> a <st data-num="444" class="">person</st>.<n id="7" />
In those days people will seek death, but will not be able to find it; they will long to die, but death will flee from them.
Now the locusts looked like horses equipped for battle. On their heads were something like crowns similar to gold, and their faces looked like men’s faces.

They<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2192" class="">had</st> <st data-num="2359" class="">hair</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">like</st> <st data-num="1135" class="">women’s</st> <st data-num="2359" class="">hair</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="3599">teeth</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">were</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">like</st> <st data-num="3023" class="">lions’</st> <st data-num="3023" class="">teeth</st>.

They <st data-num="2192" class="">had</st> <st data-num="2382" class="">breastplates</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="5613" class="">like</st> <st data-num="4603" class="">iron</st> <st data-num="2382" class="">breastplates</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="5456" class="">sound</st> of <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="4420" class="">wings</st> was <st data-num="5613" class="">like</st> the <st data-num="5456" class="">noise</st> of <st data-num="4183" class="">many</st> <st data-num="2462" class="">horse-drawn</st> <st data-num="716" class="">chariots</st> <st data-num="5143" class="">charging</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> <st data-num="4171" class="">battle</st>.

They <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3769" class="">tails</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2759" class="">stingers</st> <st data-num="3664" class="">like</st> <st data-num="4651" class="">scorpions</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="1849" class="">ability</st><n id="2" /> to <st data-num="91" class="">injure</st> <st data-num="444" class="">people</st> for <st data-num="4002" class="">five</st> <st data-num="3376" class="">months</st> is <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="3769" class="">tails</st>.
They have as king over them the angel of the abyss, whose name in Hebrew is Abaddon, and in Greek, Apollyon.
The first woe has passed, but two woes are still coming after these things!
Then the sixth angel blew his trumpet, and I heard a single voice coming from the horns on the golden altar that is before God,

<st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st> to the <st data-num="1623" class="">sixth</st> <st data-num="32" class="">angel</st>, the one <st data-num="2192" class="">holding</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="4536" class="">trumpet</st>, “<st data-num="3089">Set free</st><n id="2" /> the <st data-num="5064" class="">four</st> <st data-num="32" class="">angels</st> who are <st data-num="1210" class="">bound</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">at</st> the <st data-num="3173" class="">great</st> <st data-num="4215" class="">river</st> <st data-num="2166" class="">Euphrates</st>!”

<st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="5064" class="">four</st> <st data-num="32" class="">angels</st> who had been <st data-num="2090" class="">prepared</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">for</st> this<n id="2" /> <st data-num="5610" class="">hour</st>, <st data-num="2250" class="">day</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="3376" class="">month</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1763" class="">year</st> were <st data-num="3089" class="">set free</st> <st data-num="2443" class="">to</st> <st data-num="615" class="">kill</st><n id="4" /> a <st data-num="5154" class="">third</st> of <st data-num="444" class="">humanity</st>.

The<n id="1" /> <st data-num="706" class="">number</st> of <st data-num="4753" class="">soldiers</st> on <st data-num="2461" class="">horseback</st> was <st data-num="1417 3461">200,000,000</st>;<n id="2" /> I <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="706" class="">number</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">Now</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3779" class="">this is what</st> the <st data-num="2462" class="">horses</st> and <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="2521" class="">riders</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1492" class="">looked</st> like <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> my<n id="3" /> <st data-num="3706" class="">vision</st>: The riders <st data-num="2192" class="">had</st> <st data-num="2382" class="">breastplates</st> that were <st data-num="4447" class="">fiery red</st>,<n id="4" /> <st data-num="5191" class="">dark blue</st>,<n id="5" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2306">sulfurous<n id="6" /> yellow</st> in color.<n id="7" /> The<n id="8" /> <st data-num="2776" class="">heads</st> of the <st data-num="2462" class="">horses</st> looked <st data-num="5613" class="">like</st> <st data-num="3023" class="">lions’</st> <st data-num="2776" class="">heads</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4442" class="">fire</st>, <st data-num="2586" class="">smoke</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2303" class="">sulfur</st><n id="9" /> <st data-num="1607">came out</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">of</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="4750" class="">mouths</st>.

A <st data-num="5154">third</st> of <st data-num="444" class="">humanity</st> was <st data-num="615" class="">killed</st> <st data-num="575">by</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">these</st> <st data-num="5140" class="">three</st> <st data-num="4127" class="">plagues</st>, that is,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1537" class="">by</st> the <st data-num="4442" class="">fire</st>, the <st data-num="2586" class="">smoke</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="2303" class="">sulfur</st> that <st data-num="1607">came out</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">of</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="4750" class="">mouths</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> the <st data-num="1849" class="">power</st><n id="1" /> of the <st data-num="2462" class="">horses</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">resides</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="4750" class="">mouths</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="3769" class="">tails</st> <st data-num="1063" class="">because</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="3769" class="">tails</st> are <st data-num="3664" class="">like</st> <st data-num="3789" class="">snakes</st>, <st data-num="2192" class="">having</st> <st data-num="2776" class="">heads</st> that <st data-num="91">inflict injuries</st>.

The <st data-num="3062" class="">rest</st> of <st data-num="444" class="">humanity</st>, who had <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> been <st data-num="615" class="">killed</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">by</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">these</st> <st data-num="4127" class="">plagues</st>, did <st data-num="3761" class="">not</st> <st data-num="3340" class="">repent</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">of</st> the <st data-num="2041" class="">works</st> of <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="5495" class="">hands</st> <st data-num="2443" class="">so that</st> they did <st data-num="3361">not stop</st> <st data-num="4352" class="">worshiping</st> <st data-num="1140" class="">demons</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1497" class="">idols</st> made<n id="1" /> of <st data-num="5552" class="">gold</st>, <st data-num="693" class="">silver</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="5470" class="">bronze</st>, <st data-num="3035" class="">stone</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3585" class="">wood</st>—<st data-num="3739" class="">idols</st> that <st data-num="3777 1410">cannot</st> <st data-num="991" class="">see</st> <st data-num="3777" class="">or</st> <st data-num="191" class="">hear</st> <st data-num="3777" class="">or</st> <st data-num="4043" class="">walk</st> about.
Furthermore, they did not repent of their murders, of their magic spells, of their sexual immorality, or of their stealing.
